title: U.S. Banking Watchdog Makes Case for Tokenization, Just Not on Public Blockchains
description: Self-styled crypto skeptic Michael Hsu, the acting head of the U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC), said tokenization of assets is a serious advance into the future of finance, but decentralized blockchains may be too problematic to handle that movement.

title: Politics Is Interested in Crypto, Even if Crypto Isn't Interested in Politics
description: If U.S. policymakers want to help direct crypto, benefitting consumers an innovation, they will need to learn to compromise, says John Rizzo.
